img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 73.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Wukong_Thunderclap_73.jpg)
To start, Yellowbrow will often charge up his spiked mace before thrusting it right at you, increasing its length and size with surprising reach.
img_below_text:
Expect him to follow up this attack be retracting it, and then slamming it over his head down in front of him with another ranged mid-range attack.
These two attacks have a lot of weight to them, and leave him with considerable openings to get in plenty of hits while he retracts his weapon and resets his posture, so make the most of them!

To start, Yellowbrow will often charge up his spiked mace before thrusting it right at you, increasing its length and size with surprising reach."
        - Following Text: "Expect him to follow up this attack be retracting it, and then slamming it over his head down in front of him with another ranged mid-range attack.
These two attacks have a lot of weight to them, and leave him with considerable openings to get in plenty of hits while he retracts his weapon and resets his posture, so make the most of them!"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character named Yellowbrow attacking the player with a spiked mace. Yellowbrow's attack involves charging up the mace and thrusting it with increased length and size, followed by retracting and slamming it down for another mid-range attack. The image highlights the dramatic and intense nature of the combat, with visible lightning effects and detailed environment design.
